Package it.polimi.ingsw.am38.Network.Client

Interface ClientInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote, Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientRMI
public interface ClientInterface extends Remote, Serializable
This interface is implemented from the ClientRMI

    • getString

      String getString() throws RemoteException
      This method let the server know when a client wants to perform a login (i.e. create an instance of Player)
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • setPhase

      void setPhase(Turnings t) throws RemoteException
      Method that set in the ClientCommandInterpreter the phase of the game to let it elaborate only certain type of input
      Parameters:
      t - is the phase to set (ENUM)
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • setStarterCards

      void setStarterCards(HashMap<String,Integer> starterCards, Symbol goldTop, Symbol resourceTop, int[] goldGround, int[] resourceGround) throws RemoteException
      Method to set in the ClientDATA the id of the starter card drawn by each player
      Parameters:
      starterCards - is the HashMap containing as key: the nickname of each player, as value: their starter cards
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • confirmedDraw

      void confirmedDraw(int cardDrawnId, int goldFaceUp1id, int goldFaceUp2Id, int resFaceUp1Id, int resFaceUp2Id, Symbol goldTopCardSymbol, Symbol resTopCardSymbol) throws RemoteException
      Method to update the client's info after a draw gone well
      Parameters:
      cardDrawnId - id of the card drawn
      goldFaceUp1id - id of one of the gold card on the ground
      goldFaceUp2Id - id of one of the gold card on the ground
      resFaceUp1Id - id of one of the resource card on the ground
      resFaceUp2Id - id of one of the resource card on the ground
      goldTopCardSymbol - id of the gold card on top of the deck
      resTopCardSymbol - id of the resource card on top of the deck
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • confirmedPlacement

      void confirmedPlacement(String nickname, int id, int x, int y, boolean face, int points, VisibleElements visibleElements) throws RemoteException
      Method to update the client's info after any player has placed
      Parameters:
      nickname - of the player that has placed a card
      id - of the card placed
      x - coordinates on the player's field
      y - coordinates on the player's field
      face - chosen for the card placed
      points - given by the card placed
      visibleElements - elements on the field updated after the card placed
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • otherDrawUpdate

      void otherDrawUpdate(String nickname, int resourceFaceUp1Id, int resourceFaceUp2Id, int goldFaceUp1Id, int goldFaceUp2Id, Symbol resourceTopCardSymbol, Symbol goldTopCardSymbol, int cardDrawnId, String[] playerHandCardColors) throws RemoteException
      Method to notify other player's draw
      Parameters:
      nickname - of the player who has drawn
      resourceFaceUp1Id - id of one of the resource cards on the ground
      resourceFaceUp2Id - id of one of the resource cards on the ground
      goldFaceUp1Id - id of one of the gold cards on the ground
      goldFaceUp2Id - id of one of the gold cards on the ground
      resourceTopCardSymbol - id of the resource card on top of the deck
      goldTopCardSymbol - id of the gold cards on top of the deck
      cardDrawnId - id of the card drawn
      playerHandCardColors - hashMap of the players and their cards in the hands
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • reconnectionDataUpdate

      void reconnectionDataUpdate(HashMap<String,PlayerDisconnectionResendInfo> playersInfo, ArrayList<PlayableCard> ownHand, String nickname, int upGc1, int upGc2, int upRc1, int upRc2, Symbol goldTop, Symbol resourceTop, int sharedObj1, int sharedObj2, int personalObj) throws RemoteException
      Method to get the information after a disconnection
      Parameters:
      playersInfo - HashMap of String, PlayerDisconnectionResendInfo , key: nickname of all players, value: all available information about each Player
      ownHand - List of PlayableCard containing all 3 cards in the Player's hand
      nickname - String containing the name of the Player
      upGc1 - GoldCard face up n1
      upGc2 - GoldCard face up n2
      upRc1 - ResourceCard face up n1
      upRc2 - ResourceCard face up n2
      goldTop - Symbol representing the top of the gold deck
      resourceTop - Symbol representing the top of the resource deck
      Throws:
      RemoteException - ignored
